sentence: A three-way primary between Kathy Coder, Jason Killmeyer and Jeremy Shaffer will determine the Republican nominee in this seat.
author:
Mary Ellen McIntire
Kate Ackley

title: What to watch in Kentucky, North Carolina and Pennsylvania primaries

sentence: DeLuzio had 63 percent of the vote to Meloys 37 percent with an estimated 86 percent counted when AP called the race at 10:30 p.m. DeLuzio will face Jeremy Shaffer, a former Ross Township commissioner, who took 59 percent of the vote in a Republican primary against Kathy Coder and Jason Killmeyer.
author:
Herb Jackson
Mary Ellen McIntire
title: Key results from Tuesdays primaries
